commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: change main method to echo user commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Add feature following Level-1 instructions.
Rename Duke to Tako for unique name.

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename EXIT_PROGRAM to EXIT_COMMAND
Tako class: add list command and store user input
commitResults.messageBody: Add feature following level-2 instructions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task class
commitResults.messageBody: Package states and functionality related to a task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: add task list functionality in main method
commitResults.messageBody: Add feature following level-3 instructions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Todo, Deadline and Event classes
commitResults.messageBody:
There are multiple type of tasks with similarities between them.

Let's use inheritance to reduce code duplication and make use of
polymorphism.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix previous commit where files were not staged
Tako class: Add support for tracking ToDos, Deadlines & Events
commitResults.messageBody:
There are different type of tasks to track.

Let's add new commands to track the different tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: Do automated text UI testing
commitResults.messageBody:
Ensure that Tako class works as intended.

Let's test all valid commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Tako specific exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
To handle errors caused by users using Tako incorrectly.

Let's add exceptions to deal with the following:
* empty description for commands related to creating a task
* invalid input
* marking a task that is out of range

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: throw and handle exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Tako stops working when an invalid input is given.

Let's allow Tako to throw exceptions when an invalid input is given
and then handle it to allow Tako to continue working.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: use Arraylist instead of an array to store tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Arraylist can be used to store data instead of just an array.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: add support for deleting tasks from list
commitResults.messageBody: Add feature following level-6 instructions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Command enum
commitResults.messageBody:
Since there are only a fixed set of commands, we can use an enum to
represent the commands.

Let's change all command constants to values under the Command
enum. User input is now trimmed and a static contains method is
added to Command enum.

This allows us to convert user input from type String to Command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Bye command: only works if "bye" is inputted.
commitResults.messageBody: To be consistent with how the list command works.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: Add save and load methods
commitResults.messageBody:
The tasks tracked by Tako are not saved when the program is closed,
causing Tako to lose all tracked tasks.

Let's,
* add a method to save the tasks on a file in the user's computer
* add a method to load the same tasks on starting Tako

commitResults.messageTitle: Use LocalDateTime to handle dates and times.
commitResults.messageBody:
Dates and times are represented using strings which lack the
features of LocalDateTime that Tako can use.

Let's change Deadline and Event to store dates and times as
LocalDateTime. Tako should also be changed to take in date and time
inputs and parse them as LocalDateTime.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tako class: Add saveToFile() method
commitResults.messageBody:
The save() method rewrites the whole file even though only one task
is added.

This is inefficient when there are multiple tasks in the task list.

Let's,
* add a saveToFile() method to append to the file instead
* abstract out the file formatting details from save() such that
saveToFile() and saveTasksToFile() methods can both call a method
to do the file formatting

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Tako class into different classes
commitResults.messageBody:
It is hard to maintain Tako as it does everything by itself.

Let's,
* refactor Tako into different classes with only one
responsibility
* refactor previous exceptions into one TakoException since the way
exceptions are handled is the same
* add abstract command class so that each command can handle their
own behaviour

commitResults.messageTitle: Put all classes into a java package
commitResults.messageBody:
There is a lack of organisation where all the classes are in the
same folder.

Let's put all the classes into a java package.

commitResults.messageTitle: Set up Gradle and checkstyle on Gradle
commitResults.messageBody:
Automate build tasks of Tako and make sure code follows style
guide.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unit tests for Parser and TaskList
commitResults.messageBody:
Ensure that public methods for Parser and TaskList work as
expected.

commitResults.messageTitle: TaskListTest: add space after throws TakoException
Add JavaDoc for all classes and public non-trivial methods.
Add FindCommand to find tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow the user to find tasks related to a keyword.

To support the find command, let's also
* change TaskList to be able to find tasks based on a keyword
* allow Parser to parse for find
* allow Ui to display what is found

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDocs and unit tests related to the find command
Replace Tako text-based UI with GUI
commitResults.messageBody: Follow Level-10 requirements.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug in storage where the wrong format was being loaded.
DialogBox fxml: display all text with no truncation
commitResults.messageBody:
For the list command, users will want to see all tasks without the
dialog box truncating the tasks that are further down the list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions
commitResults.messageBody:
There are several invariants of some methods that should hold true.

There is nothing to check that these invariants are true.

Let's add assertions to check these invariants.

Assertions can be disabled without modifying the code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Some parts of the code are not very readable due to the following
reasons:
* long method
* use of magic numbers

Let's extract out methods from code fragments that are grouped
together and use named constants to explain magic numbers.

This will make the code more readable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more assertions
Fix style issues
Add sort command to sort task list
commitResults.messageBody:
Users can only see their tasks in the order they were added in.
They may want to see which tasks they want to finish urgently or
prefer a different ordering.

Let's add a sort command to sort the task list.

This allows the user to provide arguments to specify how they
would want to sort the task list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unit test for sort() in TaskList and parsing sort in Parser
commitResults.messageBody:
There are no tests to verify that the new sort command works and
whether or not it breaks the old features.

Let's add unit test for the sort command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix unit test import statement ordering
Give credit for reused work
Add title to GUI
Update README.md
Fix header comments
